channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Ala Eddine GRINE
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Ala Eddine GRINE

item.title: Churn prediction and machine learning at scale with Pyspark and Spark MLlib.
item.description: Project Overview: This project is part of Udacity’s Data Scientist Nanodegree. It focuses on customer churn, a key metric for customer-facing businesses in a wide range of industries, including telecommunications, e-commerce, and streaming services. Predicting churn is critical, as customer retention is the main driver of a companyâ€™s revenue. Problem statement: This is a customer churn prediction problem. Users can subscribe to a premium level or a free level that displays ads between songs.

item.title: Recommendations with IBM
item.description: This project is part of Udacity’s Data Science Nanodegree Program in collaboration with IBM. The aim of this project is to build a recommendation system for users of the IBM Watson community. A dataset of 5149 users, 714 articles and about 46K interactions is used to develop this RecSys. The project is divided into the following sections: Build an ETL pipeline to extract, clean and load the data to a SQLite database.

item.title: Disaster Response Project
item.description: This project is part of Udacity’s Data Science Nanodegree Program in collaboration with Appen (formally Figure 8). The goal of this project is to build a model for an API that classifies messages received in real time during a disaster event, so that messages can be sent to the correct disaster response agency. A dataset of thousands of real-world messages during disaster events is used to build this model. The Project is divided in the following sections:

item.title: Boston AirBnB Data Analysis
item.description: Throughout this project, I was interested in using Boston Airbnb Open dataset, available here, to answer the following questions: How does seasonality affect AirBnB prices in Boston? How does location affect AirBnB prices? What are the most important features to predict AirBnB prices? What is the relationship between reviews and price? Link to GitHub repository

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Ala Eddine GRINE. I’m a certified data scientist professional with expertise in programming languages such as Python and Java, SQL databases, and data visualisation tools such as Tableau. I hold a Master’s degree in Telecommunication Engineering. I’m currently leading network analytics at Ooredoo TN. I’m skilled in most steps of data science: pre-processing data, applying statistical methods, building machine learning models, visualising data and communicating results. alaeddine.grine@gmail.com
